email.title: IC Hack 19 Final Year Tickets - Sold Out
email.text:
Hi there!
DoCSoc have reserved a limited number of IC Hack 19 tickets for **final year students who have not attended an IC Hack in the past**. If you fall into this criteria and would like a ticket to attend IC Hack 19 Powered by Cisco, reply to this email as soon as possible and we will send you a ticket while there are still some remaining!
email.heading: IC Hack 19

event.text:
24 hours. Amazing prizes. Are you ready for IC Hack 19?
Running for its eighth consecutive year, weâ€™re bringing over 400 of the UK's most creative and talented students together for 24 hours of learning, building, fun, and networking on the weekend of 26-27th January 2019. Come create something cool!
IC Hack 19 Powered By Cisco will be hosted on Imperial College London's South Kensington campus.
